japanese:
今日はマジで疲れたな……。
いくらなんでも予想外すぎるだろ。
translation:
Today was seriously tiring...
Everything's just way too unexpected.

japanese:
（こっちにだって、
　やらなきゃいけないことがあるってのに）
translation: (Even here, I have things I must do.)

japanese:
（はぁ……。
　結局、今日もこれといった成果はなしか）
translation:
(*sigh*
 When it comes down to it,
 I didn't really achieve anything today.)

japanese:
（……ここまでの間に
　あいつらの変装を見破る有効なヒントは
　正直言って、得られていない）
translation:
(...Honestly, I haven't really obtained any
 useful hints to see through their disguises
 during this game.)

japanese:
（しかも五つ子が揃ってると、
　周囲の注目を集めて騒ぎになりかねないときた）
translation:
(And when all five of them are together,
 it attracts attention and leads to a commotion.)

japanese: （状況的には最悪だ……）
translation: (This situation is the worst...)

japanese:
（すでに明日１日を残すのみ。
　早く変装を見破るヒントを見つけないと
　間に合わなくなる）
translation:
(There's only one day left now. I need to find a hint
 to see through their disguises quickly,
 or it'll be too late.)

japanese:
水族館では良いところまで行けたんだがなぁ。
あそこで野次馬さえ集まらなければ……。
translation:
We made it pretty far at the aquarium, though.
If only there weren't so many gawkers there...

japanese:
まったく同じなんてあるわけないじゃん。
いくらなんでも体つきくらいは違うっしょ。
translation:
There's no way they're exactly the same.
Their body shape should at least be different, right?

japanese: ……体つきか。
translation: ...Body shape, huh?

japanese:
（四葉は普段から運動しているし、
　筋肉の付き方でわかるかもしれないな）
translation:
(Yotsuba exercises regularly,
 so I might be able to tell
 by the way her muscles are toned.)

japanese:
（一花も女優なんだ。
　体型維持には気を遣っているだろうし
　他の４人とは多少は違うかもしれない）
translation:
(Ichika is an actress.
 She probably pays attention to maintaining her figure,
 so she might be a bit different from the other four.)

japanese:
（あっ！
　そういえば、ほくろで見分けられるって
　以前、三玖が言ってたな！）
translation:
(Ah!
 Come to think of it, Miku mentioned
 that you can distinguish them by their moles!)

japanese:
（って、ダメだー！
　そもそも誰にどんなほくろがあるのか知らねぇし！）
translation:
(Ah, that's no good!
 I have no idea who has what mole!)

japanese:
（だが、うまく探りを入れれば
　見破る手段にはなるか？）
translation:
(But, if I can skillfully investigate,
 it might become a means
 to see through their disguises, right?)

japanese:
……明日は海水浴だったな。
水着なら体格やほくろも観察しやすいし、
イチかバチか探ってみるのも手か……。
translation:
...Tomorrow is the beach. If they're in swimsuits,
 it'll be easier to observe their body types and moles,
 so it might be worth taking that gamble...

japanese:
他に手立てが思いつかない以上、
そうするしかないよな。
translation:
There's no other choice, is there?
I can't think of anything else.

japanese:
（仕方がないんだ。
　いまはその方法に頼るしか――）
translation:
(It's out of my hands.
 Right now, I have to rely on that method%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
（いや、本当にそうなのか？
　それが正しいやり方なのか！？）
translation:
(No, is that really okay?
 Is that the right way to do it?!)

japanese: ……そうだ、これじゃダメだ！
translation: ...No, this won't do!

japanese:
（……そもそも、あいつらの爺さんの温泉宿で
　俺は一度、三玖の変装を見抜いている）
translation:
(...Come to think of it,
 I once saw through Miku's disguise
 at their Grandpa's hot spring inn.)

japanese:
いや、さすがに無理だろ。
俺はなにを考えてるんだ。
translation:
No, it's really impossible, isn't it?
I'm being ridiculous.

japanese:
（野次馬の戯言にまで頼ろうとするなんて、
　俺もよっぽど追い詰められてるな……）
translation:
(I'm so desperate
 that I'm relying on the words of onlookers...)

japanese:
（だが、いくら策がないからって
　それは違う気がする）
translation:
(But, even if I have no plan,
 I feel like this is wrong.)

japanese: まだ、なにかあるはずだ……。
translation: Still, there has to be something else...

japanese:
（……そもそも、あいつらの爺さんの温泉宿で
　俺は一度、三玖の変装を見抜いている）
translation:
(...Come to think of it,
 I once saw through Miku's disguise
 at their Grandpa's hot spring inn.)

japanese: ……本当にそれでいいのか？
translation: ...Is that really okay?

japanese: （自分で言っておきながら、なにかが違う気がする）
translation:
(Even though I just said it,
 I have a feeling something is off.)

japanese:
（確かに体つきで区別できるかもしれないが……
　それは、俺とあいつらの間で培った絆じゃないだろ）
translation:
(Indeed, I might be able to distinguish them
 by their body types...but that's not
 the type of connection we've made.)

japanese:
そうだよな。
やっぱり、このやり方は間違ってる。
translation: That's right. This method is definitely wrong.

japanese:
（……そもそも、あいつらの爺さんの温泉宿で
　俺は一度、三玖の変装を見抜いている）
translation:
(...Come to think of it,
 I once saw through Miku's disguise
 at their Grandpa's hot spring inn.)

japanese:
（あの時も、最初は太腿の怪我を目印に
　相手を特定しようとしていたが――）
translation:
(At that time, I also tried to identify who it was
 based on the injury on her thigh, but%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: （結局、それは上手くいかなかった）
translation: (In the end, it didn't work out well.)

japanese: （あの時、俺はなぜ相手が三玖とわかったんだ？）
translation: (Why did I know that it was Miku?)

japanese: あいつらを見分ける方法……。
translation: A way to tell them apart...

japanese:
きっとあなたもできるはずです。
愛があれば！
translation:
Surely you can do it too.
If you have love!

japanese:
お母さんが昔、言ってました。
愛さえあれば自然とわかるって。
translation:
Our mother used to say that.
If you have love, you can naturally tell them apart.

japanese: （そうだ……）
translation: (That's it...)

japanese: 愛。
translation: Love.

japanese: 愛があれば見分けられる。
translation: With love, you can tell them apart.

japanese:
（もう一度、爺さんの言葉を思い出すんだ！
　上杉　風太郎！）
translation:
(Once more, I need to remember their grandfather's words!
 Uesugi Futaro!)

japanese:
長い月日を経て……
相手の仕草、声、ふとした癖を知ること。
translation:
After a long time...
One comes to know their gestures, voices, and habits.

japanese: それはもはや、愛と言える。
translation: That can be called love.

japanese:
それは一朝一夕ではできん。
お主はなんのために孫を見分けたいんだ？
translation:
It cannot be done overnight.
For what reason do you want
to tell my granddaughters apart?

japanese:
見分けられるようになって、
お主がしたいことはなんだ？
translation: What do you want to do once you can tell them apart?

japanese: 俺がしたいことは……。
translation: What I want to do it...

japanese: お主に、孫たちと向き合う覚悟があるのか？
translation:
Do you have the determination
to face my granddaughters?

japanese: なにやってたんだ、俺は。
translation: What have I been doing?

japanese:
（俺がしなきゃならないのは、
　あいつらの変装を見破ることなんかじゃない）
translation:
(What I need to do
 isn't just to expose their disguises.)

japanese:
（あいつらに翻弄されすぎて、
　いつの間にか目的と手段が入れ替わっちまってた）
translation:
(I've been manipulated by them so much
 that my purpose and means have been reversed,
 without me noticing.)

japanese:
（しかも、変装を見破ろうと意識しすぎたせいで
　勝手に戸惑ってたんだから笑えない！
　本当に馬鹿なのか俺は！！）
translation:
(And because I was too conscious
 of figuring them out,
 I confused myself. I'm really an idiot!)

japanese: ……残すは、明日１日だ。
translation: ...Only one day remains. Tomorrow.

japanese: （だがもう、焦る必要もない）
translation: (Yet, there's no need to rush anymore.)

japanese: （覚悟だって、すでに決まっているんだからな）
translation: (I've already made up my mind.)
